title: Caribou Hideaway, Caramel, 24 Count
description: Sometimes life is like a game of hide-n-seek. Some say that not all who wander are lost, but once in a while getting lost is rather rewarding. So venture forth and locate that figurative fork in the road, put on a blindfold, whirl around a few times and start reconnoitering. Maybe you will discover it is where you should have been all along. We hope that from the first cup to the last that Caramel Hideaway inspires you to do explore all life offers? If you get that feeling too, then we have done our job. Caramel Hideaway is crafted to bring flavors of artisanal caramel notes of whipped cream and smooth coffee flavor together in a 100% Rainforest Alliance Certified, Kosher cup of single serve coffee.

title: Caribou Coffee Thoughts and Insights
The smell is everything! Buttery, nutty, smooth!
Caribou Coffee - Life is Short, Stay Awake for it
Afternoon coffee routine electric kettle and French Press
Whole Bean Favorite Caribou Coffee
